dashboards.name: Portal Metrics
dashboards.description:
Populated by the LogicMonitor_Portal_Metrics datasource. We recommended creating a LogicMonitor "device" in the portal, then applying this module to that device.

For additional instructions, see: https://bit.ly/2HSsAjl

config.description: Percentage of time Windows Servers went less than 5 minutes without data acquisition from LogicMonitor.

dashboards.name: Citrix XenApp / XenDesktop
dashboards.description:
Provides visualization of data obtained using the Citrix Delivery Controller OData API.

##defaultResourceProduct## can be updated on a (cloned) dashboard for XenDesktop uses.

config.name: ##defaultResourceProduct## Applications by Peak Concurrent Instances (Last 24 Hours)

items.name: ##RESOURCENAME##

dashboards.description: This dashboard is intended to monitor a Slack instance from a LogicMonitor collector, added as a distinct resource to the resource tree; some customization may be required in other circumstances.
